name: Acid Burn
description: 1d3 points of acid damage.

name: Corrosive Bold
description: 1d4/level acid damage (max 5d4).  Repeats on second round.  Ranged touch attack.

name: Acid Wave
description: 1d6/level acid damage (max 10d6).  Sickened for 1 round/level, or 1 round on save.

name: Caustic Cloud
description: Cloud that obscures vision.  1d6/level acid damage (max 20d6) and fatigued.

name: Alignment Shield
description: +2 AC, +2 saves vs. alignment.  End spell to reroll save.

name: Alignment Assault
description: 1d8/2 level damage to aligned creatures. 1d6/level to outsiders.  Staggered for 1 round/level on failed save.

name: Alignment Aura
description: +4 AC and saves.  SR 25.  2d6 damaged if hit.

name: Nature's Calm
description: Animal or magical beast will not attack.

name: Wild Lure
description: Animal or magical beast defends caster and will not attack allies.

name: Nature's Command
description: Animal or magical beast obeys commands

name: Force Block
description: +1 force armor AC.  Boost: immediate action, +1 level

name: Lock Ward
description: Closes an object.  Other effects are delayed until object is opened.

name: Force Shield
description: +4 force armor

name: Force Armor
description: +4+1/4 level force armor, or +1 to another armor source

name: Force Ward
description: +6 + 1/4 levels force armor or +2 to another armor source.

name: Paralyze Humanoid
description: Paralyze a humanoid.  Save at end of each turn.

name: Paralyze Creature
description: Paralyze any creature.

name: Permanent Paralysis
description: Paralyze creature.  Only one additional save.

name: Fortify
description: +1 saves, +1 temporary hit point/hit die

name: Energy Resistance
description: Resistance 10 to one energy type.

name: Enhance Form
description: +4 to one physical stat.  End to gain +8

name: Perfect Form
description: +4 Str, Dex, Con

name: Energy Immunity
description: Immune to one type of energy

name: Altered Form
description: +2 Str(size), 2 of claws, bite, climb speed, swim speed, darkvision, low-light vision, scent, +2 natural armor, boost: 3 effects or Selected target

name: Bestial Form
description: +4 Str and 3 of Altered Form or fly, grab, pounce, trip, +4 nat armor.  Boost: 4 benefits or Selected target

name: Monstrous Form
description: Better Bestial Form

name: Cold Snap
description: 1d3 cold damage

name: Frost Fingers
description: 1d6/level cold and staggered for 1 round

name: Ice Blast
description: 1d6/level cold damage.  Entangled for 1d4 rounds.

name: Winter's Wrath
description: Creates blizzard.  1d6/level cold and 1d4 Dex damage. 5 feet visibility.  Fire immunity.

name: Friendship
description: Caster is trusted ally.  Defends caster and will not attack allies.

name: Simple Order
description: Approach, Drop, Fall, Flee or Halt.  Boost: any target word, +3 levels.

name: Accerate
description: Extra move action.  Boost: Extra attack during full attack instead of extra move.

name: Cramp
description: Speed reduced by half

name: Fade
description: Invisibly until attacks.  Boost: remains invisible if attacks.

name: Disappear
description: Invisble until attacks. Boost: remains invisible if attacks.  +2 levels.

name: Undeath
description: Target becomes skeleton or zombie.

name: Sense Hidden
description: See invisible creatures and object.  Boost: see through illusions, polymorph and concealment.  +4 save vs illusion, +4 levels

name: Suppress
description: Suppress one spell on a willing target with caster level check.  Boost: target unwilling creature, +1 level

name: Far Sight
description: Create sensor at long range to use senses, including spells.  Boost: anywhere on plane near known creature.  +2 levels.

name: Locate
description: Know fastest path to a known location.

name: Spark
description: 1d4 electricity damage

name: Shock Arc
description: 1d4/level electricity damage

name: Lightening Blast
description: 1d6/level electricity damage

name: Ball Lightening
description: 1d8/level electricity damage to one target and half to others

name: Terror
description: Target is frightened.  Save for shaken for 1 round

name: Horror
description: 10/level damage.  Save for 3d6+1/level

name: Flame Jet
description: 1d4 fire damage

name: Burning Flash
description: 1d4/level fire damage.  Boost(sorc/wiz): 1d6/level, +1 level

name: Fire Blast
description: 1d6/level fire damage

name: Cinder Storm
description: 1d6/level fire

name: Unfetter
description: Reverses gravity

name: Soothing Touch
description: Dying target is stablized.  Boost: remove shaken, sickened or fatigued.  +1 level

name: Lesser Cure
description: Head 1d6+1/level healing.  Boost: 1d8+1/level

name: Moderate Cure
description: 2d6+1/level healing.  Boost: 2d8+1/level

name: Greater Cure
description: 3d6+1/level healing. Boost: 3d8+1/level

name: Elder Cure
description: 4d6+1/level healing.  Boost: 4d8+1/level

name: Radiance
description: Light like a torch at a fixed location.

name: GLOOM
description: 20 feet darkness, reducing light by one step

name: Sunshine
description: 30 feet light increases by one step

name: Purify
description: Remove curses, diseases or posion. New saving throw.  Or remove 1d4 temporary negative levels or 1 permanent negative level.

name: Revive
description: Raises dead target

name: Cramp
description: Reduce base speed by half

name: Wrack
description: Sickened

name: Torture
description: nauseated.  Additional save at end of turn.

name: Blind
description: Blinds target

name: Stun
description: Stuns target

name: Kill
description: Kills target with less than 101 hit points.

name: Discordant Note
description: 1d4/level sonic damage, staggers for 1 round

name: Sound Blast
description: 1d6/level sonic damage

name: Destructive Vibration
description: 1d6/level sonic damage, deafens for 1 round/level

name: Dimensional Hop
description: Teleports willing target within line of sight and spell range

name: DimensionalJump
description: Telerports willing target within same plane.

name: Dimensional Shift
description: Teleports willing targets to another plane

name: Fleet
description: Increase base land speed by 10

name: Dash
description: Incrase base land speed by 30

name: Decelerate
description: Target is staggered.  New save at end of each turn.  Boost: target does not get an additional save.

name: Predict
description: Predict good/bad results for 1 hour into the future

name: Borrow Future
description: Target moves now, skips next turn.  Boost: target is staggered on next turn.

name: Wind Wall
description: Wall blocks ranged attacks, is difficult terrain.

name: Fire Wall
description: Wall of fire deals 2d6+1/level fire damage to those passing through.  Block line of sight.

name: Ice Wall
description: Wall of ice.  1 inch/level thick, 3 hp/level.  Blocks line of sight.

name: Stone Wall
description: Stone wall.  1 inch/level thick, hardness 8, 15 hp/inch.  Block line of sight

name: Blade Wall
description: Wall of blades.  Deals 1d6/level damage to creatures in contact.  Provides cover by does not block line of sight

name: Fog Bank
description: Clould blocks all sight past 5 feet.  Concealment at 5 feet.  Boost: Can move burst version 10 feet/round as swift action.

name: Wind Blast
description: Blast of wind affects Large and smaller creatures

name: Blizzard
description: Heavy snow.  Limits vision to 5 feet.  Difficult terrain.  Boost: 2d6 cold damage each round at end of creatures turn. +1 level.

name: Unmake
description: Dispell all spells on willing target.
